page.title: 01Introduction Monks Kirby
page.content: Our area for the{Domesday Project covers {Monks Kirby}which is a rural community village. It is called{Monks {Kirby}because of the monks who used to live in an{Abbey}which has now been knocked down.In the village are two schools which are{Brockhurst Middle {and St.Joseph's}which is also a school but for younger children. {George Busby}who has a farmshop in Monks Kirby sells vegetables and other things to eat.There have been some new houses built recently which are called French Houses they take their name from the the company that built them.There are two pubs in Monks Kirby called The Denbigh Arms and The Bell Inn.There is only one shop in Monks Kirby which is also a Post Office the shop sells quite a lot of things like washing up powder sweets dog food and things like that.
